Name: HMS Indomitable
Propulsion:
Parsons geared steam turbines
six boilers
three shafts
111,000 shp (83,000 kW)
Range: 11,000 nautical miles (20,000 km; 13,000 mi) at 14 knots (26 km/h; 16 mph)
Armament:
16 × 4.5-inch anti-aircraft (AA) guns
48 × 2-pounder AA guns
10 × 20 mm AA guns
Aircraft carried:
1942: 22 Sea Hurricane, 12 Martlet and 16 Albacore
1943: 55 Seafire and Albacore
1945: 45 Hellcat and Avenger
